str.txt: Select the installation folder of your eXo Portal:
The installation path already contains a SpagoBI installation. This will be overwritten therefore existing configurations will be lost. Continue?
The following SpagoBIPlatform external engines were installed:
No SpagoBIPlatform external engines were installed.
SpagoBI Demo examples and example portal 'sbiportal' were installed.
SpagoBI Auditing and Monitoring documents and monitoring portal 'sbiportal' were installed.
SpagoBI Demo examples with Auditing and Monitoring documents and example portal 'sbiportal' were installed.
Neither Demo examples nor Auditing and Monitoring documents nor example portal 'sbiportal' were installed.
To start eXo-Portal server with SpagoBIPlatform click on the icon or launch:
The following SpagoBIPlatform additional modules were installed:
No SpagoBIPlatform additional modules were installed.
Then connect to http://localhost:$SERVER_PORT/portal and start to work with SpagoBI!!
Then connect to http://localhost:$SERVER_PORT/sbiportal to see the SpagoBI Demo examples.
Then connect to http://localhost:$SERVER_PORT/sbiportal to see the Auditing and Monitoring documents and start to work with SpagoBI!!
Then connect to http://localhost:$SERVER_PORT/sbiportal to see the SpagoBI Demo examples and Auditing and Monitoring documents.
The folder does not contain any selected packs. These packs will be downloaded into this folder. Continue?
The folder contains %0 of %1 selected packs. Missing packs will be downloaded into this folder. Continue?
The folder is not writable. The packs will be downloaded from the remote repository. Continue?
The folder will be created and all selected packs will be downloaded here. Continue?

Now you have to select the local repository folder. As explained before, SpagoBI Core and its engines binary packs are not included in this installation file. If you have already executed this installation procedure or if you have manually downloaded the packs, select the folder where packs were downloaded. Otherwise select an empty folder: packs will be automatically downloaded inside it from a remote repository.
Select the path of your local SpagoBI repository:

In order to execute Perl based ETL jobs, SpagoBITalendEngine needs a local Perl interpreter installation. If you have a Perl interpreter installed on your pc, select in the box below its home folder. Otherwise you will be able to execute only java based jobs, not Perl based ones; click on 'Next' and ignore the warning message.
Select the home directory of your Perl interpreter installation:
No folder has been selected. Perl based jobs will not work. Continue?
Selected folder does not seem to be a Perl interpreter installation home folder. Perl based jobs may not work. Continue?
